Developer Terms of Use
des:
By working with Amazon Alexa, you can easily control Puwell-compatible smart home devices such as lights, switches and outlets just by talking to Alex Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap and Echo Show. 
To get started, find PuwellCloud skill and select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your PuwellCloud account and discover your devices. When using the skill, you need to give suitable names for your different devices by changing the names in the App, for example, "Bedroom light", "Living room switch" and "Kitchen light".
Here are some of the voice commands:
"Alexa, turn on the Bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn off the Bedroom light"
"Alexa, set hallway light to 50 percent"
"Alexa, make the Kitchen light warmer"
"Alexa, set the Bedroom light to green"
"Alexa, set the Living Room light to cool white"
Currently supported device:
Smart Light
